tool.name: tool_deleting_output
tool.command: rm '$out_file1' || true && ## alle sure that this does not fail. exit $exit_code
tool.help:
This tool tests what happens if the underlying program removes the output data set, it should fail independent of the exit code and the exit code should be correctly checked.
With outputs_to_working_directory this provoked https://github.com/galaxyproject/galaxy/issues/14206
